title: Chemical Plant Multi-core Cable Connections vs. Flexible Busbar Solutions
excerpt: How many parallel cable connections have you dealt in chemical plants This is the distribution system of a large chemical enterprise plant with numero...
content:
**How many parallel cable connections have you dealt in chemical plants?**

![Cable Forest Image](https://yanghuasti.oss-cn-shenzhen.aliyuncs.com/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20250730/6388946900420037967099851.jpg)

This is the distribution system of a large chemical enterprise plant, with numerous black cables weaving into a network between equipment, like an impenetrable 'cable forest,' quite spectacular.

![Chemical Plant Distribution](https://yanghuasti.oss-cn-shenzhen.aliyuncs.com/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20250730/6388946929007860321130095.jpg)

Chemical plants operate 24 hours non-stop, with large equipment typically requiring currents above 1000A. Over 80% of workshop main cables use 4-8 parallel designs, with some old plants even showing extreme cases of 10 parallel cables.

![Parallel Cable Configuration](https://yanghuasti.oss-cn-shenzhen.aliyuncs.com/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20250730/6388946930937832503301686.jpg)

This 'quantity stacking' approach essentially uses simple addition to address complex needs, laying hidden dangers for safety.

### Problems with Multiple Parallel Cables:

1. **Uneven current distribution** - Some cables face dramatically increased overload risks
2. **Tight installation space** - Reduced heat dissipation efficiency  
3. **Doubled connections** - More troublesome installation, increased failure points (each additional parallel increases connection hazards by over 30%)
4. **Environmental challenges** - Steam, acid-alkali dust, equipment vibration, high temperature amplify defects

### Flexible Busbar Solutions:

**Highlight 1: High Current Capacity**
- Large single conductor current capacity
- Greatly reducing parallel requirements
- Long-distance capability
- IP68 protection standard
- Indoor/outdoor installation suitable

![Application Example 1](https://yanghuasti.oss-cn-shenzhen.aliyuncs.com/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20250730/6388946942521302886142731.png)

**Highlight 2: Reduced Connections**
- Direct bending within radius without turning connections
- No intermediate connections for long distances
- Prevents water vapor and dust penetration

![Application Example 2](https://yanghuasti.oss-cn-shenzhen.aliyuncs.com/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20250730/6388946943436682204780149.png)

**Highlight 3: Easy Installation**
- Small size, light weight
- Simple drilling connection with copper bars
- Compatible with cable trays, conduits, trenches

![Application Example 3](https://yanghuasti.oss-cn-shenzhen.aliyuncs.com/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20250730/6388946944228143447430955.png)
author: Yanghuasti Technology

title: Multi-parallel Cable Current Deviation Problems
excerpt: Why do multiple parallel cables always have one heating up first In electrical systems operation current deviation or shunting in multiple parallel ca...
content:
**Why do multiple parallel cables always have one heating up first?**

![Current Deviation Illustration](http://yanghuasti.jx5.szbdk.cn/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20250703/6388715242653421775624089.png)

In electrical systems operation, current deviation or shunting in multiple parallel cables is common. During parallel installation, the actual current capacity is not a simple '1+1=2' relationship. **Very likely '1+1=1.5' or even '1+1=1' phenomena may occur!**

### What is Cable Current Deviation?

![Current Distribution](http://www.yanghuasti.com/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20250703/6388715298284674518109911.png)

Ideally, current in each conductor should be evenly distributed. However, reality shows uneven distribution, causing cable current deviation.

### Causes of Current Deviation:

1. **Three-phase load imbalance** - Important factor
2. **Harmonic interference** - Cannot be ignored  
3. **Line faults** - Contributing factor
4. **Installation issues**:
   - Loose copper lug compression
   - Poor contact surface connections
   - Oxidation and dirt affecting contact resistance

![Installation Issues](http://www.yanghuasti.com/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20250703/6388715333385043201677435.jpg)

### Consequences:
- Conductors with high current experience abnormal heating
- Accelerated insulation material aging
- Declined insulation performance
- Safety risks: leakage, short circuits, fires

### Flexible Busbar Solution:

![Flexible Busbar Display](http://www.yanghuasti.com/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20250703/6388715357870363588010081.jpg)

**Key Advantages:**
- Large single conductor current capacity (200-6300A)
- Reduces or eliminates need for multiple parallels
- Simple drilling connection method
- No copper lug installation required
- Reduces installation costs and complexity

![Project Application](http://www.yanghuasti.com/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20250703/6388715360691874756187723.png)

Many newly built commercial buildings and industrial plants have adopted high-current flexible busbars with excellent operational results, greatly improving electrical system safety and stability.
author: Yanghuasti Technology

title: Building Electrical Low-Carbon Energy Efficiency Forum
excerpt: Second Appearance HighCurrent Flexible Busbar at Architectural Electrical LowCarbon Energy Saving Forum On March 19 flexible busbars participated agai...
content:
**Second Appearance! High-Current Flexible Busbar at Architectural Electrical Low-Carbon Energy Saving Forum**

On March 19, flexible busbars participated again in the 17th Architectural Electrical Low-Carbon Energy Saving Forum. The forum closely followed the 'Spectacular National Games, Low-Carbon Practice' theme, highly aligned with global sustainable development trends.

This is the second time Yanghua Technology's high-current flexible busbars have participated in this technical forum. With unique product advantages, they break through traditional limitations, featuring high current capacity and convenient installation, effectively solving pain points in current high-current power transmission and distribution traditional solutions.

![Forum Scene 1](http://www.yanghuasti.com/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20250321/6387814670425165811838484.jpg)

![Forum Scene 2](http://www.yanghuasti.com/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20250321/6387814674096078537025244.jpg)

![Forum Scene 3](http://www.yanghuasti.com/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20250321/6387814677167589101474283.jpg)

During this participation, flexible busbars engaged in deep exchanges with designers from major design institutes nationwide again, helping the architectural electrical field achieve low-carbon transformation and contributing to achieving 'dual carbon' goals.

![Forum Scene 4](http://www.yanghuasti.com/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20250321/6387814679671710673155884.jpg)

![Forum Scene 5](http://www.yanghuasti.com/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20250321/6387814687694782892380566.jpg)
author: Yanghuasti Technology

title: Supporting Xinjiang's Belt and Road Construction
excerpt: Supporting Xinjiangs Belt and Road Construction Flexible Busbars Always on the Road Xinjiang known as the Golden Corridor open to innovation and conne...
content:
**Supporting Xinjiang's 'Belt and Road' Construction, Flexible Busbars Always on the Road**

Xinjiang, known as the 'Golden Corridor' open to innovation and connectivity, is located in the center of the Eurasian continent and is an important node of the ancient Silk Road. With the deepening of the 'Belt and Road' initiative and Western Development, Xinjiang's trade exchanges with various countries have become increasingly close.

![Xinjiang Map](http://www.yanghuasti.com/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20250103/6387151135772742497717749.png)

According to incomplete statistics, as of November 2024, Xinjiang's total foreign trade import and export value exceeded 400 billion yuan, with growth rates ranking first in the country.

### Government Visit and Cooperation

On December 23, Xu Feng, Party Group Member and Deputy Mayor of Alashankou City People's Government, led a team to visit Yanghua Technology to investigate flexible busbars.

![Government Visit](http://www.yanghuasti.com/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20250103/6387151138338219721812496.jpg)

Yanghua Technology Chairman Zhang Haidong explained in detail the advantages and applications of flexible busbars, and both sides conducted in-depth discussions about future cooperation.

![Meeting Discussion](http://www.yanghuasti.com/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20250103/6387151141742754721944546.jpg)

### Investment Promotion Conference

On December 26, the company was invited to participate in the 'Shenzhen-Xinjiang Linkage, Belt and Road New Chapter' investment promotion conference hosted by the national-level Wujiaqu Economic and Technological Development Zone.

![Conference](http://www.yanghuasti.com/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20250103/66d795d3-5085-49da-8da6-47e0a79f991f.jpg)

Wujiaqu has rich mineral resources and solid industrial foundation, including domestic agricultural machinery manufacturing base, steel production and processing base, and various chemical parks.

title: Digital Energy Pioneer Exhibition

content:
**Digital Energy Pioneer, Smart Innovation Future — High-Current Flexible Busbar Exhibition Highlights**

On September 11, 2024, the 4-day 2024 International Digital Energy Exhibition concluded at the Shenzhen Convention and Exhibition Center. Yanghua Technology's high-current flexible busbar exhibition booth was fully upgraded, with multiple flexible busbar solutions and coiled flexible busbars making their debut.

![Exhibition Booth 1](http://www.yanghuasti.com/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20240913/6386184358268813623970276.png)

During the exhibition, leaders from Shenzhen Power Supply Bureau visited the booth for guidance and expressed recognition for the innovation and future development of high-current flexible busbars.

![Exhibition Booth 2](http://www.yanghuasti.com/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20240913/6386184361134953533777752.png)

![Exhibition Booth 3](http://www.yanghuasti.com/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20240913/6386184362403431718569230.png)

As an innovative product for power transmission and distribution, high-current flexible busbars inject new vitality into the power industry's development toward green and smart electricity.

![Exhibition Booth 4](http://www.yanghuasti.com/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20240913/6386184363501228038216844.png)

![Exhibition Booth 5](http://www.yanghuasti.com/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20240913/6386184365337827314303178.png)

![Exhibition Booth 6](http://www.yanghuasti.com/Data/yanghuasti/upload/image/20240913/6386184366658552395237815.png)
